categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Borm was a male Human Sith Lord who served the Sith Empire during the Cold War.
During the Cold War, he sold specialized gear for Sith Warriors in the Combat Training section of Vaiken Spacedock.

Borm first appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a level 50 Battlemaster PVP Gear vendor. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
